hints.content:
We start at $12{:}55$ when Rohit finishes reading. 

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 12:15 to 1:00 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 12:55. !

hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents $1$ minute.

So, we need to move **left** on the number line $32$ minutes.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{12{:}55} -{} &\greenD{10}\text{ minutes} = 12{:}45\\\\
12{:}45 -{} & \purpleD{20}\text{ minutes} = 12{:}25 \\\\
12{:}25 -{}&\goldE{2}\text{ minutes} = \goldE{12{:}23}\\\\
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 12:15 to 1:00 with tick marks every 1 unit. A series of three arrows are shown moving right to left from the 12:55 tick mark to the 12:23 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 12:55  tick mark and ends at the 12:45 tick mark and is labeled minus 10. The second arrow starts at the 12:45 tick mark and ends at the 12:25 tick mark and is labeled minus 20. The third arrow starts at the 12:25 tick mark and ends at the 12:23 tick mark and is labeled minus 2. !

hints.content:
Rohit starts reading at $12{:}23\text{ p.m.}$

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 12:15 to 1:00 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 12:23. !

question.content:
Rohit reads for $32$ minutes. He finishes reading at  $12{:}55\text{ p.m.}$ 

**Which number line below graphs when Rohit starts reading?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 12:15 to 1:00 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 12:17.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/37d29a677bf158b417531bd2b341be770b5dd28a)
![A number line labeled 12:15 to 1:00 with tick marks every 1 unit. A dot is marked at 12:32.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/df2ebae11ede1978e3d00c58e0f3042c9ea6807b)
![A number line labeled 12:15 to 1:00 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 12:23.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b46667577d6987c4f6575a02bea310ad9d3c554b)
